original_text: What we have said becomes even clearer now. Another kind of priest has come, who is a priest like Melchizedek.
korean_text: 멜기세덱과 같은 별다른 한 제사장이 일어난 것을 보니 더욱 분명하도다

sentences.original_text: What we have said becomes even clearer now
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 말한 것이 이제 더 명확해집니다

sentences.original_text: Another kind of priest has come
who is a priest like Melchizedek
